summary: This document is a subpoena issued by the State Attorney's Office in Palm Beach County, Florida, commanding compliance from Metro PCS for subscriber information related to an ongoing investigation. It outlines the legal obligations of the recipient and the consequences of non-compliance.

persons.name: Steve Cockrum
persons.context: Steve Cockrum is mentioned as the recipient of the subpoena, which requests subscriber information from Metro PCS.

persons.name: Joe Remy
persons.context: Detective Joe Remy is referenced as the contact for compliance with the subpoena, indicating his involvement in the investigation.

persons.name: Joe Recarey
persons.context: Detective Joe Recarey is mentioned as the sender of the fax cover sheet related to the subpoena compliance request.

connections.description: Steve Cockrum is the recipient of a subpoena issued by law enforcement, specifically Detective Joe Remy.
Both Joe Remy and Joe Recarey are involved in the investigation and are part of the Palm Beach Police Department.

events.title: Subpoena Issued
events.description: A subpoena was issued to Metro PCS for subscriber information as part of an investigation by the Palm Beach Police Department.

locations: 401 North Dixie Highway, West Palm Beach, Florida
345 South County Road, Palm Beach, FL 33480
keyFacts: The subpoena commands compliance from Metro PCS for subscriber information related to a criminal investigation.
Failure to comply with the subpoena may result in contempt of court.
The document emphasizes the confidentiality of the subpoena request to prevent interference with the investigation.
